KPIs.title: Block Production
KPIs.description: In order to have a reliable network, a KPI focusing on block production and validator stability is required. Timestamp of each block can be found using the block explorer (divided by 1000).
KPIs.annihilation: Block finalization lags more than 600 blocks behind head at any point throughout the measurement period
successEvents: The difference between timestamps of block #1341211 and block #1441593 must be less than 604,710,000 milliseconds

KPIs.title: Validator Stake
KPIs.description: To ensure no foul play by Validators, the incentives must be strong enough to keep them honest.
successEvents: Have the Validators earn >20% of the max on average over the last 72,000 blocks (5 days)
Have the Validators earn >30% of the max on average over the last 57,600 blocks (4 days)
Have the Validators earn >40% of the max on average over the last 43,200 blocks (3 days)
Have the Validators earn >50% of the max on average over the last 28,800 blocks (2 days)

KPIs.title: Proposal Clearance
KPIs.description: For the governance process to work, all proposals must be dealt with professionally, and in a reasonable time frame to avoiding blocking new proposals coming in.
successEvents: No proposals expire due to missing votes
At no point will the number of active proposal stay at 5 for longer than 14,400 blocks (~24h)
All forum posts discussing old proposals are added to the their respective proposal discussion with metadata
KPIs.annihilation: No malicious or unreasonable proposals are approved.

KPIs.title: Council Performance Review and Minutes
KPIs.description: There needs to be some level of accountability and transparency for the Council. Weekly reports will allow users make informed votes.
successEvents: The fourth Council on Constantinople (#1240411-#1341211) produces a log of events, with all of the Council's actions, challenges and tasks.
This is accompanied by a report covering its own workflow, challenges, thinking and performance.

KPIs.title: Tokenomics and State of the Network Reporting
KPIs.description: In addition to the above, there needs to be bookeeping/accounting of the platform's spending, and some general network data.
successEvents: The fourth Council on Constantinople (#1240411-#1341211) produces a report based on the newest template`*`.
The script (in typescript) that produces the output is made avaiable alongside the report.
